mapper.insert: insert into component (componentId, componentName, type, createTime, createBy, category, icon, label, title, placeholder, style) values (#{componentId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{componentName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{category,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{icon,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{label,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{placeholder,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{style,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update component set componentName = #{componentName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, type = #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, createTime = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, createBy = #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, category = #{category,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, icon = #{icon,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, label = #{label,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, title = #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, placeholder = #{placeholder,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, style = #{style,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where componentId = #{componentId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select componentId, componentName, type, createTime, createBy, category, icon, label, title, placeholder, style from component where componentId = #{componentId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select componentId, componentName, type, createTime, createBy, category, icon, label, title, placeholder, style from component
